ResearchProjectDef.label: Suborbital Rocketry

ResearchProjectDef.label: AERIAL
ResearchProjectDef.description: The AERIAL system is the final solution to all long-range attacks, featuring high-power explosives, a fully automated launch system, and the capacity to hold 6 rockets at one, as well as simultaneously fire two at once.
